last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Doubling down on the case, the team locate the detective who handled the incident — and get their hands on the missing CCTV footage.

name: Hyena
overview: To survive in a dog-eat-dog world, two rival lawyers with high-class clientele tear apart anything that stands in the way of their ambitions.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A mystery woman who frequents his laundromat catches the attention of Yoon Hee-jae, who's just taken on a divorce case for a wealthy client.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: While Hee-jae deals with office politics and the consequences of his oversight, Jung Geum-ja hustles to obtain more lucrative cases.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: With Ha Chan-ho facing charges, Geum-ja sets out to uncover a critical piece of information that may sway circumstances in her favor.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Geum-ja and Hee-jae go head-to-head over a world-class violinist who's desperate for freedom from an unfair contract.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Song Pil-jung makes a controversial hiring decision that stuns the firm. Geum-ja checks out the members of Hee-jae's team.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Geum-ja and Hee-jae have no choice but to join forces in getting to the truth of a case involving a company in trouble for a data breach.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Going up against what appears to be damning evidence against their client, Geum-ja and Hee-jae put a new strategy in motion.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Kim Min-joo returns to the firm. Hee-jae realizes he knows nothing about the real Geum-ja, who's forced to face a painful reminder of her past.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Geum-ja gets to know a suave new client who's looking for help with an acquisition. Hee-jae stumbles into a case representing a bratty kid.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Research for the case uncovers a connection to a religious cult. Meanwhile, the client's interest in Geum-ja sparks Hee-jae's jealousy.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Geum-ja returns to the cult leader with a menacing bargaining chip. Pil-jung blindsides Min-joo by asking Kevin Jung for a meeting.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: After arriving at a grisly scene, Geum-ja tries to piece together what happened. Pil-jung has his own plan for handling the situation.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Hee-jae's father grapples with a devastating blow to his reputation. Geum-ja starts to understand who is really pulling the strings.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Ga Gi-hyeok gets his chance at making partner. After Geum-ja and Hee-jae face a disciplinary board, the firm takes things a step further.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Disguised as a couple, Geum-ja and Hee-jae scope out a hotel in search of evidence for Chan-ho's appeal. Pil-jung is called to court as a witness.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Doubling down on the case, the team locate the detective who handled the incident — and get their hands on the missing CCTV footage.
